version.title: [PATCH] Failure on test_validates_acceptance_of_as_database_column

version.body: I only get the errors running the whole test suite, if i run only activerecord tests i didn't get the error. Only through rake on top directory.
version.body-html:
I only get the errors running the whole test suite, if i run only activerecord tests i didn't get the error.
Only through rake on top directory.
version.title: [PATCH] Failure on test_validates_acceptance_of_as_database_column
